typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		dept as string,
		startdate as date 'MM/dd/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['2021/*.csv']) ~> csv
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		dept as string,
		isactive as integer,
		startdate as date,
		enddate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sql
csv derive(inputhash = md5(name,dept)) ~> HASHInput
sql derive(sqlhash = md5(name,dept)) ~> HASHRef
ExistsCheckforUpdatesorNew derive(isactive = 1,
		enddate = toDate('9999-12-31')) ~> SetToActive
HASHInput, HASHRef exists(inputhash == sqlhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsCheckforUpdatesorNew
HASHRef, SetToActive exists(sql@id == csv@id
	&& sql@name == csv@name,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsCheckforObsolete
ExistsCheckforObsolete derive(enddate = toDate(currentUTC()),
		isactive = 0) ~> SetToInActive
SetToInActive alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
SetToActive sink(input(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		dept as string,
		isactive as integer,
		startdate as date,
		enddate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		dept,
		isactive,
		startdate,
		enddate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sqlsink
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		dept as string,
		isactive as integer,
		startdate as date,
		enddate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id','name','dept'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		dept,
		isactive,
		enddate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sqlsink2
